gui.saving.ImageSet

Class SingleDrawImagePanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • gui.saving.ImageSet.SingleDrawImagePanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class SingleDrawImagePanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    The Class SingleDrawImagePanel contains information of ImageLayers and MarkingLayers of them. User can select which ImageLayers and MarkingLayers are drawn to exported images.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
